description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, from the three first texts. Physical description: 23 lines per page. Written in medium small Maghribī script in black ink with use of red. The text is framed within two black lines. Light cream European paper, glossy. Contains tables, charts , and diagrams. Kabīkaj (reading: "Kīkataj") on first fol. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals (omits first fol.). Origin: The copy of two texts in the volume is dated, beginning of [Dhū al-]Ḥijjah 1200 [Dec. 1786] (fol. 25a) and Thursday, the night of 10 Jumādá al-Awwal 1203 [Feb. 6, 1789] (fol. 29b).
author: Ḥanafī, ʻAlī ibn Māmī.
abstract: Collection of short treatises and excerpts on astronomy.
contents: 6. fol. 130a-149b: Faṣl fī maʻrifat al-ṭāliʻ min al-kawākib ... [etc].
extent: ii, 150, ii leaves: paper ; 217 x 160 (153 x 94) mm. bound to 220 x 170 mm.
title: Sharḥ Zīj Sanjaq Dār. Zīj. Zīj Sanjaq Dār ... [etc.].
creator: حنفي، علي بن مامي
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
